resources.string: The BaseFramework framework includes immersive adaptations, encapsulation of Activity, Fragment, and Adapter, and provides widgets such as permission requests, jumps, delays, prompts, and log output to make it easy to build Android apps quickly.

···· Return data after simple jump

···· Skid back

· Setting, storage of attribute values ​​Preferences
· AppManager
· Asynchronous or synchronous (demo operation)
· BaseAdapter

· Enhanced log
· Behavior and log monitoring
· Language change tool
